contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|cotter}} '''Cotter''' may refer to: *[[Cotter (pin)]], a pin or wedge used to fix parts rigidly together *[[Cotter (farmer)]], the Scots term for a peasant farmer formerly in the Scottish highlands *[[Cotter (surname)]], an surname (including a list of people with the name) *[[Cotter, Arkansas]], United States *[[Cotter, Iowa]], United States *[[Mount Cotter]], a mountain in California, United States *[[Cotter River]], a river in the Australian Capital Territory *[[Cotter (film)|''Cotter'' (film)]], a 1973 film by Paul Stanley ==See also== *[[Cotter pin (disambiguation)]] *[[McCotter]], a surname *[[The Cottars]], a Canadian musical group {{disambiguation|geo}}
